source_note: State baseline derived from Iowa DNR Solid Waste and Recycling Program and local city services; local rules vary.

organics.guidance: Yard waste composting and drop-offs regulated under Iowa DNR rules; food waste composting encouraged but not required.
organics.bin: Yard waste cart or compost drop-off.
organics.notes: Some cities like Iowa City offer curbside compost collection.
provenance: Iowa DNR Solid Waste and Composting rules

paper_cardboard.guidance: Recycle clean paper and cardboard; flatten and keep dry.
paper_cardboard.bin: Blue recycling bin or drop-off center.
paper_cardboard.notes: Exclude waxed or heavily soiled materials.

glass_containers.guidance: Recycle glass bottles and jars (rinsed, lids off).
glass_containers.bin: Glass-only drop-off bins or mixed recycling where accepted.
glass_containers.notes: Not all curbside programs accept glass.
provenance: City of Des Moines recycling information

metal_containers.guidance: Recycle clean aluminum and steel/tin cans.

plastics.guidance: Recycle bottles and jugs labeled #1–#2; check local acceptance for #5.
plastics.notes: Plastic film, bags, and foam not accepted curbside.

beverage_containers_crv.guidance: Iowa has a statewide 5¢ deposit (Iowa Bottle Bill) for eligible containers.
beverage_containers_crv.bin: Return to redemption centers or retailers.
beverage_containers_crv.notes: Includes beer, soda, and water containers.
provenance: Iowa Beverage Container Deposit Law (Iowa Code §455C)

household_batteries.guidance: Recycle rechargeable and lead-acid batteries via HHW or collection programs.
household_batteries.bin: Drop-off at HHW site or Call2Recycle.
household_batteries.notes: Keep batteries out of curbside bins.

e_waste.guidance: Electronics recycling supported through Iowa DNR programs and local events.
e_waste.notes: Accepted items vary; TVs and monitors may have fees.

plastic_bags_and_film.guidance: Plastic bags and film not accepted curbside.
plastic_bags_and_film.bin: Return to retail store drop-off bins.
plastic_bags_and_film.notes: Plastic bag recycling available through store programs only.

bulky_items.guidance: Schedule bulky waste pickup or deliver to landfill/transfer station.
bulky_items.notes: Most cities charge per-item or appointment fees.
